sourcesContent:
import { Badge, Box, Flex, Grid, Icon, Link, Stack, Tooltip } from '@chakra-ui/core';
import { BodyText, Button, SmallText, Subtitle, XSmallText } from 'app/components';
import React from 'react';
import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'
import ReactJson from 'react-json-view';
import logs from '../../../../logData';
import { useClipboard } from "@chakra-ui/core";

const DetailsPage = () => {
  let { id } = useParams<{id: string}>()
  let log:any = logs.find(log => log.meta.id === id)
  const { onCopy, hasCopied } = useClipboard(id)

  return (
    <Stack className="parent-container" style={{height: 'calc(100vh - 150px)'}}>                                                     
      <Stack className="child-container">
        <Stack className="child" pb={3}>
          <Stack isInline className="grandchild" pb={2}>
            <SmallText fontWeight="medium">REQUEST</SmallText>
            <Tooltip aria-label="copy request ID" label={hasCopied ? "Copied" : "Copy request ID"}>
              <Button
                onClick={onCopy}
                variant="unstyled"
                ml="auto"
                _hover={{
                  color: 'red',
                  bg: "gray.300",
                  fontWeight: "700"
                }}
                height="0"
              >
                <Flex align="center" color="gray.500">  
                  <XSmallText>{id}</XSmallText>
                  <Icon name="note" />
                </Flex>
              </Button>
            </Tooltip>
          </Stack>
          <Box className="child">
            <Stack isInline alignItems="center">
              <Subtitle>{log.method + ' ' + log.path}</Subtitle>
              <Badge bg="#e3e8ee">
                <XSmallText fontWeight="medium">
                  {log.meta.statusText === 'OK' ? '200 OK' : '403 ERR'}
                </XSmallText>
              </Badge>
            </Stack>
          </Box>
        </Stack>
        <Stack className="child meta-container"
          borderTop="1px solid #e3e8ee"
          borderBottom="1px solid #e3e8ee"
          py={4}
        >
          <Grid templateColumns="repeat(12, 1fr)">
            <Box gridColumn="1/6">
              <Box>
                <Box>
                  <Stack isInline w="100%" className="time-container">
                    <Box
                      flex="1 1 20%"
                      minW="120px"
                      maxW="200px"
                      color="gray.500"
                      fontWeight="medium"
                    >
                      <SmallText>Time</SmallText>
                    </Box>
                    <Box>
                      <SmallText as="u">{log.meta.time}</SmallText>
                    </Box>
                  </Stack>
                  <Stack isInline w="100%" py={2} className="address-container">
                    <Box
                      flex="1 1 20%"
                      minW="120px"
                      maxW="200px"
                      color="gray.500"
                      fontWeight="medium"
                    >
                      <SmallText>IP address</SmallText>
                    </Box>
                    <Box>
                      <SmallText>{log.meta.ipAddress}</SmallText>
                    </Box>
                  </Stack>
                  <Stack isInline w="100%" className="api-container">
                    <Box
                      flex="1 1 20%"
                      minW="120px"
                      maxW="200px"
                      color="gray.500"
                      fontWeight="medium"
                    >
                      <SmallText>API Version</SmallText>
                    </Box>
                    <Box fontWeight="500">
                      <Link
                        href="https://docs.simpu.co/"
                        d="flex"
                        isExternal
                        color="blue.500"
                        alignItems="center"
                        style={{ textDecoration: 'none' }}
                      >
                        <SmallText>{log.meta.apiVersion}</SmallText> <Icon name="external-link" mx="2px" />
                      </Link>
                    </Box>
                  </Stack>
                </Box>
              </Box>
            </Box>
            <Box gridColumn="7/-1">
              <Box px={4}>
                <Box>
                  {log.method === 'GET' 
                    ? 
                    <Stack isInline w="100%" className="application-container">
                      <Box
                        flex="0 0 20%"
                        minW="120px"
                        maxW="200px"
                        color="gray.500"
                      fontWeight="medium"
                      >
                        <SmallText>Application</SmallText>
                      </Box>
                      <Box fontWeight="500">
                        <Link
                          d="flex"
                          color="blue.500"
                          alignItems="center"
                          style={{ textDecoration: 'none' }}
                          isExternal
                        >
                          <SmallText>ProfitWell</SmallText>
                        </Link>
                      </Box>
                    </Stack>
                    :
                    <Stack isInline w="100%" className="source-container">
                      <Box
                        flex="0 0 20%"
                        minW="120px"
                        maxW="200px"
                        color="gray.500"
                      fontWeight="medium"
                      >
                        <SmallText>Source</SmallText>
                      </Box>
                      <Box>
                        <SmallText>{log.meta.source}</SmallText>
                      </Box>
                    </Stack>
                  }
                  {log.method === 'GET'
                    ?
                    <Stack isInline w="100%" py={2} className="source-container">
                      <Box
                        flex="0 0 20%"
                        minW="120px"
                        maxW="200px"
                        color="gray.500"
                      fontWeight="medium"
                      >
                        <SmallText>Source</SmallText>
                      </Box>
                      <Box>
                        <SmallText>{log.meta.source}</SmallText>
                      </Box>
                    </Stack>
                    :
                    log.response.id &&
                    <Stack isInline w="100%" py={2} className="related-container" wordBreak="break-word">
                      <Box
                        flex="0 0 20%"
                        minW="120px"
                        maxW="200px"
                        color="gray.500"
                      fontWeight="medium"
                      >
                        <SmallText>Related</SmallText>
                      </Box>
                      <Flex align="baseline">
                        <SmallText as="span" d="flex" flexWrap="wrap">customer-
                        <Link
                          d="flex"
                          color="blue.500"
                          alignItems="center"
                          style={{ textDecoration: 'none' }}
                          isExternal
                        >
                          {log.response.id}
                        </Link>
                        </SmallText>
                      </Flex>
                    </Stack>
                  }
                  {log.method === 'POST' && log.meta.Idempotency &&
                    <Stack
                      isInline
                      align="baseline"
                      w="100%"
                      wordBreak="break-word"
                      className="idempotency-container"
                    >
                      <Box
                        flex="0 0 20%"
                        minW="120px"
                        maxW="200px"
                        color="gray.500"
                      fontWeight="medium"
                      >
                        <SmallText>Idempotency</SmallText>
                      </Box>
                      <Box>
                        <SmallText as="span">{log.meta.Idempotency}
                        <Tooltip as="span" aria-label="Idempotency info" hasArrow label="An idempotency key is passed in a request to guarantee it is only executed once" placement="top">
                          <Icon name="info" size="12px" color="gray" />
                        </Tooltip>
                        </SmallText>
                      </Box>
                    </Stack>
                  }
                </Box>
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
        </Stack>
        <Stack>
          <Grid templateColumns="repeat(12, 1fr)">
            <Box gridColumn="1/7">
              <Stack>
                <Box
                  py={4}
                  pr={5}
                  mr={5}
                  borderBottom="1px solid #e3e8ee"
                >
                  <Box className="heading" pb={4}>
                    <BodyText color="gray.900" fontWeight="bold">
                      Request POST body
                    </BodyText>
                  </Box>
                  <Box className="pb-content">
                    {log.method === 'GET' || log.meta.statusText === "ERR"
                      ?
                      <Flex justify="center" align="center" px={4} py={12}>
                        <SmallText fontWeight="medium">No POST body</SmallText>
                      </Flex>
                      :
                      log.query &&
                      <Box fontSize="12px">
                        <ReactJson
                          src={log.query}
                          enableClipboard={false}
                          displayDataTypes={false}
                          displayObjectSize={false}
                        />
                      </Box>
                    }
                  </Box>
                </Box>
                <Box py={4}>
                  <Box className="heading" pb={4}>
                    <BodyText color="gray.900" fontWeight="bold">
                      Request query parameters
                    </BodyText>
                  </Box>
                  <Box className="qp-content">
                  {log.method === 'GET' 
                      ?
                      <Box fontSize="12px">
                        <ReactJson
                          src={log.query}
                          enableClipboard={false}
                          displayDataTypes={false}
                          displayObjectSize={false}
                        />
                      </Box>
                      :
                      <Flex justify="center" align="center" px={5} py={12}>
                        <SmallText fontWeight="medium">No query parameters</SmallText>
                      </Flex>
                    }
                  </Box>
                </Box>
              </Stack>
            </Box>
            <Box gridColumn="7/-1">
              <Stack px={4}>
                <Box py={4}>
                  <Box className="heading" pb={4}>
                    <BodyText color="gray.900" fontWeight="bold">
                      Response body
                    </BodyText>
                  </Box>
                  <Box className="response-content">
                  {log.method === 'GET' 
                      ?
                      <Flex justify="center" align="center" px={5} py={12}>
                        <SmallText fontWeight="medium">We do not save the response body for successful GET requests.</SmallText>
                      </Flex>
                      :
                      <Box fontSize="12px">
                        <ReactJson
                          src={log.response}
                          enableClipboard={false}
                          displayDataTypes={false}
                          displayObjectSize={false}
                        />
                      </Box>
                    }
                  </Box>
                </Box>
              </Stack>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
        </Stack>
      </Stack>
    </Stack>
  )
}

export default DetailsPage;
